name: Hare's Hollow
description:
EDIT: Hare's Hollow is now playable in-browser! You can still download the desktop version below.

An exciting visual novel for 3 of your 5 senses. Play as Fox and explore Hare's Hollow to discover the secret story of the animals.

Made for the WAG challenge by a patchwork quilt of ne'er-do-wells known as the SweetHeart Squad, using a custom engine.
